availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

person.persName: John Dishman (Commonwealth's attorney for the Twelfth District of Kentucky)

body.p: Barbourville and Lexington, Kentucky, attorney and commonwealth's attorney. Virginia native. Son of William Dishman. Married to Jane T. Atchison Dishman. Attorney in Barbourville, Kentucky. Commonwealth's attorney for the 12th Judicial District of Kentucky from 1858 to 1861. Attorney in Lexington from 1861 to 1865.

ab.bibl:
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Knox, Barbourville, p. 36.
"John Dishman (1820-1894)," Find A Grave, Memorial #15309240, accessed June 18, 2017, https://www.findagrave.com/memorial/15309240.
William Elsey Connelley and E. M. Coulter, History of Kentucky, vol. 5 (Chicago: The American Historical Society, 1922), 423.
